bug.title: PNR prolongation doesnt work properly with identical point numbers on different kmq
bug.body: see also cismet/wupp#1948

bug.title: Changes in geometry of Kompensation not saving
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1836

bug.title: fixing missing non-argument constructors for treppe panels
bug.body: in preparation: for https://github.com/cismet/wupp/milestone/62

bug.title: NPE in StadtbildUtils if aufnahmedatum is null
hardcoded rasterfari url in bplaene renderer
Sb_stadtbildserieEditor - pruefen field is true but pruefhinweis_von is null
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1569

bug.title: infra kita renderer/editor is showing the red button for some valid urls
bug.body: cismet/wupp#1468

bug.title: missing capabilities url of GEP layers after application restart
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1451

StadtbildSerieEditor and -Renderer not working anymore

bug.title: potential endless-loop in VermessungsunterlagenExceptionJsonDeserializer
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1237

bug.title: ENTER to jump to next field in FlurstueckDialoge does not work anymore
missing jxl runtime dependency
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1137

bug.title: inconsistent calculation of the number of available higres images
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/848

bug.title: MauerEditor not invoking dipose() auf DefaultCismapGeometryComboBoxEditor
HighRes-Download-Button in "shopping cart" stays disabled even if it shouldnt.
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/848

bug.title: PointNumberReservation - filename = null_null.txt when downloading protocol
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1094

bug.title: PNR protocoll not downloadable, if it is the last one that was released.
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1086

bug.title: incorrect identification of buchungsstellen in baulastbescheinigungdialog
bug.body: see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1078

bug.title: VermessungsunterlagenauftragRenderer - TopologyException: no outgoing diredge found
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1073

bug.title: PointNumberDialog - cbAntragsNummer disabled for reservation
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1060 if there are no pointnumbers, cbAntragsNummer ist disabled. This prevents the reservation of new pointnumbers in some cases.

bug.title: berechtigungspruefung - jobname ignored for baulastbescheinigung
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1050

bug.title: berechtigungspruefung - no detail objects for baulastbescheinigung
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1033

bug.title: berechtigungspruefung - no multiple message bug
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1025

bug.title: berechtigungspruefung dialog anhang label not reseted
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1042

bug.title: bug in punktnummernreservierung dialog
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1018 https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/1022

bug.title: NPE in BaulastenReportGenerator
bug.body: see: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/985 If there are some unexpected problems with the metadata, an NPE occures in the BaulastenReportGenerator, which leads to an empty report. Exceptions should be catched.

bug.title: no total sum in nas preview with java8
bug.body: reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/927#issuecomment-222440423

bug.title: no preview for new and unsaved stadtbildserie objects
Abbruch der Baulastbescheinigung bei gelöschten Baulasten.
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/899

bug.title: Punktnummernreservierung not EditorValue because of non-editable Combobox
bug.body: switch to `getSelectedItem`

bug.title: BaulastenPictureFinder is not using WebAccessManager
bug.body: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/857 BaulastenPictureFinder uses HttpURLConnection for checking urls. This doenst work for users using the CallServerTunnel !

bug.title: typo in billing property "abrechnungsdatum"
bug.body: `abgrechnungsdatum` => `abrechnungsdatum`

bug.title: OAB: add waterlevel layer group to map issue
bug.body: If the waterlevel timeseries layergroup is added to the map from a catalogue node it is displayed in the layer widget but not loaded properly (thus not visible on the map at all). If it is added using the capabilities section of cismap it works as expected.

bug.title: Malformed URL exception if no BillingPopup shown
AlkisPrintingSettingsWidget not zooming reliably
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/800 When switching from a product to another, the mapzoom sometimes doesn't assure that the printing feature matches in the boundingbox of the current view. This occures if the selected product can be printed with a lower scale then the previous one. The automatic selection in the dialog chooses the right scale, but the zoom is applied to the lower one.

bug.title: Wrong toString-reperesentation in toString-Konverter
bug.body: `<baulastblatt> / <laufende_nummer>` should be `<baulastblatt>/<laufende_nummer>` (without blanks)

bug.title: abgerechnet field not set for new billing_billing objects
bug.body: abgerechnet field should be set to FALSE by default

bug.title: StartupHooks running in EDT
bug.body: ButlerStartUpHook and NasStartupHook runs their code on the EDT. Instead, this code should run in a own thread outside the EDT.

bug.title: SuchworteDialog filter expression should be escaped
bug.body: the filter expression should interprete regex characters as normal characters, not as part of the regex expression.

bug.title: SuchworteDialog doesnt close when escape key is pressed
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/638

bug.title: SuchworteDialog - case insensitive row filter
bug.body: row filter is case sensitive, and should be case insensitive see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/638

bug.title: ButlerDownload fails if Url has characters like Umlaut
bug.body: Some character needs to be encoded if they are used in a url. ButlerDownload should use ULREncoder to encode the url before doing the request.

bug.title: ButlerDownload no handling Exceptions correctly
bug.body: The ButlerDownload does only handle BadHttpStatusCodeExceptions. If any other Exception occurs while doing the request, the download can't be removed from the download list anymore.

bug.title: NPE in ZaehlungsstandortFeatureRenderer
bug.body: NPE in FeatureRenderer for new objects with no "Zaehlungen" reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/388

bug.title: Sb_stadtbildserieEditor geometry from street not cloned
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/524

bug.title: Sb_RestrictionLevelUtils.RestrictionLevel not Serializable
bug.body: Sb_RestrictionLevelUtils.RestrictionLevel is used as a member attribute of some node-objects. Therefore it has to be serializable (because the hole node has to be serialized). reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/740

bug.title: copy&paste in Baulastenbaltt-Editor creates duplicate array items
bug.body: pasting a "laufende nummer" object causes duplicate objects for all array entries

bug.title: wrong overlay text when image is not available at all
bug.body: overlay label always says that the preview is not available, even when the image is not available at all. should indicate that the image is not available, not only the preview image reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/707#issuecomment-68688331

bug.title: NPE in Sb_stadtbildserieAggregationRendererInfoPanel
bug.body: occurs when aufnahmedatum is null

bug.title: StadtbildserieAggregationsRenderer - visualisation of higresavailability in Warenkorb
bug.body: The overlay drawing mechanism causes some problems with some pictures (sometimes). A better and more consistent way to visualise the high-resolution availability of the picture would be to use the same overlay label as it is used in "Vorauswahl" ("x von y"). see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/707

bug.title: wrong jobname for Stadbild preview image
bug.body: the downlad uses the previews jobname instead of the new choosen one reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/712

bug.title: overlay causing CMMException ?
bug.body: Not sure if the overlay that appears in "Sb_stadtbildserieAggregationRenderer" if an image is not available in high resolution is causing the following exception => ``` Message: java.awt.color.CMMException: General CMM error528 Level: SEVERE Stack Trace: General CMM error528 sun.java2d.cmm.kcms.CMM.checkStatus(Unknown Source) sun.java2d.cmm.kcms.ICC_Transform.colorConvert(Unknown Source) java.awt.image.ColorConvertOp.filter(Unknown Source) com.twelvemonkeys.imageio.plugins.jpeg.JPEGImageReader.readImageAsRasterAndReplaceColorProfile(Unknown Source) com.twelvemonkeys.imageio.plugins.jpeg.JPEGImageReader.read(Unknown Source) javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(Unknown Source) javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(Unknown Source) de.cismet.cids.custom.utils.Sb_stadtbildUtils$FetchImagePriorityCallable.call(Sb_stadtbildUtils.java:633) de.cismet.cids.custom.utils.Sb_stadtbildUtils$FetchImagePriorityCallable.call(Sb_stadtbildUtils.java:586) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ``` We should do further investigations, like trying a version that not uses the overlay (does the exception still appear ?) reported at https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/707

bug.title: Use Twelve Monkey JPEG/TIFF Reader Plugins for ImageIO
bug.body: using the JPEG and TIFF Readers of the twelve monkeys project avoids the JVM crash when reading Stadtbildserien (https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/637) Furthermore using those plugins the apache common imaging library gets obsolete which causes another bug when reading stadbildserien images (https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/699) This issue is a more suitable fix for https://github.com/cismet/cids-custom-wuppertal/issues/300

bug.title: wrong counter value in statisticsreport
bug.body: reported at: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/289 The calculated value for "Anzahl Geschäftsbuchnummern" ist wrong. This value should be incremented once for each new valid Geschäftsbuchnummer.

bug.title: Use ImageIo as fallback mechanism when commons imaging fails loading a stadtbildimage
bug.body: When reading images with the commons imaging library, it can happen that a org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException: Invalid marker found in entropy data excpetion is thrown. This is a known bug in the commons imaging project (see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IMAGING-97) a workaround mentioned in the issue description is to catch the ImageReadExcpetion and use ImageIo as fallback for loading the image.

bug.title: bebauungsplan documents are not visible to external users
bug.body: for external users, no bebauungsplan document is shown in the bebaubungsplan renderer. the reason is, that the request to the image is made to an wupp internal server, without using the WebAccessManager and its tunnel mechanism. see also cismet/wupp#694

bug.title: VM Crashes in StadtbildAggregationRenderer
bug.body: Sometimes it can happen, that the vm crashes during the initialisation of the StadtbildAggregationrRenderer. This behaviour is only reproducable under certain circumstances. The log file of the vm crash indicates, that the Imaging Loading thread, especially loading the Image with ImageIo is the cause of the crash. To avoid this, the apache commons-imaging project should be used instead of ImageIo see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/637

bug.title: Wrong Renderer is shown
bug.body: Steps to reproduce: 1. Stadtbildsearch => search all Stadtilder of year 2010 (ca 490 results) 2. select all search results (strg-a). The creation of the aggregation renderer takes some time. 3. select single object or a subset of the search results 4. after some time it CAN happen that the aggregationrenderer of the strg-a operation appears ![bildschirmfoto vom 2014-11-19 16 19 57](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1785245/5108216/93501a4e-7008-11e4-92b4-5e84437f7816.png) The picture shows that the aggregation renderer and the selections status of the search results dont correspond

bug.title: BillingRenderer StringIndexOutOfBoundException
bug.body: When trying to download AlkisDownload product from the billing renderer table, a StringIndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown, if the AlkisProduct was configured with a custom scale. The reason for this is, that the url contains an empty parameter in fact the url contains "&&". When trying to find the "=" for that paramter the excpetion is thrown Thus we need to check if the index of '=' is not -1. If so we skip this paramter. see also: https://github.com/cismet/cids-custom-wuppertal-server/issues/84 ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1785245/4976411/b6ec0822-68e3-11e4-9c2a-f1dac9a96f60.png)

bug.title: Stadtbilder: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread
bug.body: When selecting a large amount of Stadtbildserien and moving them to the warenkorb, a OutOfMemoryError is thrown. The reason is that for each statdbild a new thread gets started which checks if the stadtbild is available in high resolution. Instead of creating a new thread, a thread pool should be used.

bug.title: Statdbildaggregationrenderer vorschau bild is shown twice
bug.body: #286 forces the first picture to be the vorschau bild of the stadtbildserie. If the vosrchaubild is not the first picture the vorschaubild is shown twice, on the first index and the original index of the vorschaubild. When fetching the bildnummer of the index of the vorschau bild, the first blattnummer must be returned

bug.title: statdbildserie preview picture is not used in aggregation renderer
bug.body: the preview picture of a stadtbildserie is not used in the aggregation renderer as the first image of the stadtbildserie. see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/594

bug.title: AggregationRenderer tries to download high res images, without checking if they exists
bug.body: The StadtbildSerienAggregationRenderer tries to download high res images, without checking if they exists. This is a problem because those images are also considered in the billing. See https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/581

bug.title: The high-res download fetches the wrong image
bug.body: The download button in the class Sb_StadtbildPreviewImage uses the wrong image for the high-res download. See also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/570

bug.title: disabling timeout for nas downloads
Error Message for interrupted NASDownload due to timeout
bug.body: when a nas download is started, this download interrupts after a timeout. If this happens, the download is only marked as erroneous in the download manager. The user should be provided with the information, that the download was cancelled due to an interrupt and that the download will be restarted after an application restart. see also cismet/wupp#552

bug.title: Wrong behaviour when downloading Vermessungsrisse
bug.body: currently there are two errors when downloading vermessungsriss documents. - if a original and a reduced size document exists the original version is integrated into the pdf report instead of the reduced size version. - if no reduced size version exists, there is no need to download also the images as jpg file see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/549

bug.title: memory-leak in Baulasteditor
memory-leak in IconFactory for Baulast and Baulastblatt
bug.body: Both icon factories uses a list of object retrival workers. This list does increase with each create node, and seems to never decrease.

bug.title: buffer ist not always applied to preview geometry in nas dialog
bug.body: if no geometry in the nas dialog is selected and a buffer is applied, the bounding box of the map is not adopted to the buffered preview geometry. see https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/527 for further information and a screenshot of te description

bug.title: Null checks when making http requests using tunnel
bug.body: same bug as it is described in https://github.com/cismet/cids-custom-wuppertal/issues/249, but also the following classes are affected: - NivellementPunktEditor.java - NivellementPunktReportScriptlet.java - AlkisPunktReportScriptlet.java

bug.title: loading map documents for ap points fails for external users
bug.body: when checking the possible URls for a ap map document, there is a missing check if the return value of the http request is null. The changes in https://github.com/cismet/cids-navigator/issues/104 causes that the first misleading request stops checking the pending URLs. Furthermore the method that uses a head request for checking the URL (introduced in https://github.com/cismet/cismet-gui-commons/issues/55) is not used here.

bug.title: Download of Vermessungriss documents loads the wrong document
bug.body: For large vermessungriss documents also a document with a reduced size is provided that is used for the preview in the navigator. When downloading the vermessungriss document also the reduced size version is downloaded instead of the original file.

bug.title: Use WebAccesManager for VermessungsrissPictureFinder
bug.body: With the development of #236, the WebAcessManager is no longer used for loading the vermessungsriss documents. Thus external users from WuNDa can not load those documents anymore. see also #510

bug.title: Deadlock in VermessungRissEditor
bug.body: Hence the VermessungrissEditor uses static GUI components, a deadlock can occur. Thus those static GUI components needs to be removed

bug.title: NPE when creating new vermessungsriss objects
bug.body: when trying to create a new vermessungriss objects an NPE is thrown. see also cismet/wupp#509

bug.title: CustomStrassenToolbarSearch might throw an NPE in constructor
bug.body: The class CustomStrassenToolbarSearch fetches the Strasse-MetaClass in its constructor and uses its afterwards. If the permissions for that class are missing the MetaClass-object will be null and therefore a NPE will be thrown.

bug.title: In the Stadtbildseriensuche, an error dialog is shown if the image numbers textfields are empty
Log message and close NAS Dialog if billing is not activated
bug.body: if the doBilling Method in the NAS Dialog returns false, the dialog is not closed and no error message is provided

bug.title: Remove Exception.printStacktrace in NASDialog
bug.body: the ok button in the NAS Dialog is wrapped in a try catch block with but an eventually thrown Exception is not logged correctly

bug.title: MetaClass not found in Sb_StadtbildWindowSearch
bug.body: If the user does not have the rights for the classes Strasse and Sb_Ort then at the start of WuNDa an error occurs in the logger, which says that a MetaClass could not be generated. The user normally does not notice this. While working at the Sb_StadtbildWindowSearch its initialization will be fasten up for those users who do not have the permissions to see this search. The same modification will also be done for the BillingWindowSearch.

bug.title: AX_Datenerhebung_Punktort is not rendered in ALKIS PointInfo Renderer
bug.body: origin cismet/wupp#338

bug.title: Logging and Error handling for Butler and NAS Downloads
bug.body: currently it can happen that an error during ButlerDownloads and NAS Downloads occurs that is not properly visualised with an error message to the user. Furhtermore a not reproducable bug in the NAS Downlaod exists. The downlaods does not finish an no exception is thrown or logged. Therefore some more logging output is needed.

bug.title: Memory Problems in Buchungblattrenderer
bug.body: ... during retrieval of Buchungsblattinfos from biggest Buchungsblatt in Wuppertal. (222 landparcels) origin cismet/wupp#467

bug.title: Excpetion during creation of MauerAggregation Renderer
bug.body: if a mauer object has no geometry set, the creation of the Aggregation Renderer fails in fact of an uncaught exception. see also cismet/wupp#438

bug.title: mauer katasterblatt report: no color for polygon geometries
bug.body: if the geometry of a mauer is a polygon, the area of the geometry has no color in the mauer katasterblatt report. see cismet/wupp#436.

bug.title: In certain cases no editor name and time logging in the baulast object
bug.body: In the baulast entity there are two protocol fields `bearbeitet_von`and ``bearbeitet_am`. These fields should get an update after a change in the object. Under certain cicumstances this is not the case.

bug.title: MauernWindowSearch does not filter pruef_datum correctly
bug.body: the format string that is used by the SimpleDateFormat that generates the date string used for the database statement only contains 3 characters for the year. Under Java 6 (or more precisely in the java environment of wuppertal) this leads to a date string that represents the year with two characters (date 2016-01-31 returns string '16-01-31' which is interpreted as 2031-01-16)

bug.title: Combobox for Vermessungstellennummer too short
bug.body: since the vermessungstellennummer can hav six characters, the respective combobox is too short

bug.title: some server searches are not in the server custom project
bug.body: The classes: FullTextSearchStatement.java Alb_BaulastChecker.java Alb_BaulastblattChecker.java are server searches and have to be moved to the server custom project.

bug.title: Data Export Popup Menu renders at wrong place
bug.body: if clicking the left part of the data export button in the toolbar, the related popupmenu renders at the upper left corner of the monitor. the reason for this is, that just the the setVisible method on the related JPopupmenu is called instead of show. see also cismet/wupp#419

bug.title: Stadtbildserieneditor: forgot to remove test case
bug.body: To test if the exception handling works as expected in Stadtbildserieneditor.SavePruefhinweisWorker a "throw new InterruptedException();" was used, but forgotten to remove.

bug.title: Wrong name of ToStringConverter for class Zaehlungwetter
bug.body: see also: https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/387 ZaehlungwettersToStringConverter => ZaehlungwetterToStringConverter

bug.title: Error during the execution of the static methods of Sb_StadtbildWindowSearch
bug.body: In Sb_StadtbildWindowSearch the static method getOrtWupertal() was executed while starting WuNDa and loaded the Location Wuppertal, so that it can be set as selected Element in the ComboBoxes. This led to an NPE when a user tried to login, which had not the necessary permissions. In the fix every exception will be caught in getOrtWupertal() and it will be called in the constructor of Sb_StadtbildWindowSearch.

bug.title: NullPointer exception if BillingBilling renderer opened
bug.body: An NullPointer exception is thrown if the BillingBilling renderer is opened: ``` java.lang.NullPointerException de.cismet.cids.custom.objecteditors.utils.RendererTools.makeReadOnly(RendererTools.java:57) de.cismet.cids.custom.objecteditors.wunda_blau.BillingBillingEditor.<init>(BillingBillingEditor.java:130) de.cismet.cids.custom.objectrenderer.wunda_blau.BillingBillingRenderer.<init>(BillingBillingRenderer.java:30) ```

bug.title: wrong encoding for Protocol file for erroneous point number reservations
bug.body: on windows clients, the characters ö,ä,ü etc are not correctly encoded in the protool file for erroneous point number reservations requests.

bug.title: wrong date in punktnummern text file
bug.body: currently the wrong date in the text file that contains a summary of the reserved point numbers is wrong. the reason is a wrong convertion of the date format

bug.title: document listener for anzahl warning message
Compilation error in LuftbildschraegaufnahmenRenderer.java
bug.body: Error was created while merging #158 in dev.

bug.title: remove cancel button in pointnumer reservation dialog
bug.body: the cancel button in the pointnumberreservation dialog is unnecessary and can be removed therefore. see also cismet/wupp#309

bug.title: No Mauer pictures in Report for external Users
bug.body: currently the mauer pictures in the mauer katasterblatt report are not displayed for external users. The reason is that the ServerTunnelAction is not used.

bug.title: Wrong error message text in datenausgabe dialogs
bug.body: since #160 also the minus sign in order names is allowed but the error message does not mention this

bug.title: Too small map bounding box for small rectangles in Butler1Dialog
bug.body: when currently a small rectangle is selected in the Butler 1 Dialog, the bounding box of the map does not regard the minum extent of 100 x 100m

bug.title: GUI freezes because of VermessungRissEditor
bug.body: In the VermessungRissEditor some SwingWorkers are executed in the EDT and therefore the GUI freezes. This is especially noticeable when the VermessungRissEditor is loaded.

bug.title: determing the folder for baulastplan document 000000-00p fails
bug.body: the document 000000-00p is introduced as indicator that no baulasten plan is necessary. when linking to this document the method that determines the folder of this document returns a wrong folder. see also cismet/wupp#311 and cismet/wupp#313

bug.title: Baulasteditor four eye principle can be compromised
bug.body: see cismet/wupp#318 for a detailed explanation

bug.title: refresh-enforcing for GrundbuchblattInputField
Input validation for MauerEditor fields
bug.body: currently there is no input validation in all fields regarding the type and the length of the input. wrong input can cause an exception when trying to save the changes. see also cismet/wupp#300

bug.title: Field san_kosten_gruendung in MauerEditor can not be safed
bug.body: the reason is a misconfigured binding

bug.title: Typing Error in MauerEditor
bug.body: One label in the MauerEditor has a typing error. instead of "Bauweksbuchfertigstellung" the labels text need to be "Bauwerksbuchfertigstellung"

bug.title: Error in Buchungsblattrenderer if called from a User with UserDomain != WUNDA_BLAU
bug.body: ... just use the method with the additional domain in the signature: ``` java getMetaObjectByQuery(User user, String query, String domain) ``` see also https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/292

bug.title: ButlerStartupHook and NasStartupHook do no check permission
bug.body: during the navigator startup, startup hooks that check if there are unfinished Butler or NAS downloads are executed. Those startuphooks do no check if there is an corresponding action attribute for the currently logged in user, wich leads to an connect exception and a logging on server and client side is generated. this can be avoided with an check if the currently logged in user has the persmission to execute those tasks.

bug.title: The drag-and-drop of a landparcel into the Vermessungsrisseditor does not work.
bug.body: @helllth If a Landparcel is dragged and dropped into the list of the Vermessungsrisseditor, only the Veraenderungsart is shown. This behaviour is normal. Nevertheless after saving of the Vermessungsriss, the whole information of the Landparcel should be shown, but, like before, only the Veraenderungsart is shown. ![selection_002](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1679281/1549855/49e39ce2-4df3-11e3-87a2-060e88c5802e.png) The problem is that after the drop of the landparcel a flurstuecksvermessung-CidsBean is created. Then the dropped landparcel is added to this cidsbean as the property "tmp_lp_orig". Later on, while saving, the dropped landparcel should be converted to a flurstuck_kicker-CidsBean. Unfortunately this never happens as the property "tmp_lp_orig" of the flurstuecksvermessung-CidsBean is always null.

bug.title: seperate search for NAS points required
bug.body: for pre calculating the fee of nas orders, the already existing measurement point search is used. if a user has the permission to execute nas queries but has no read permission for reading measurement points the search fails and an exception is displayed. (see also cismet/wupp#221) The solution is to use the server search defined in cismet/cids-custom-wuppertal-server#33. Furthermore there should only be displayed one exception if anything during fee calculation goes wrong

bug.title: Uncaught Exception in NasStartupHook
bug.body: during navigator start, the NasStartupHook checks if there are any undelivered NAS orders for the currently logged in user. A bug in the server (see also cismet/cids-custom-wuppertal-server#29) causes a NPE . At the moment only ConnectionException are catched and therefore all other Exceptions are uncaught.

bug.title: Missing Grundbuchbezirk in AlkisBuchungsblattRenderer
bug.body: The label Grundbuchbezirk is never filled with right value. It is always displaying: "keine Angabe" (originally reported in https://github.com/cismet/wupp/issues/197)

bug.title: Butler Dialog: wrong enabled status of DXF-Ausgabeformat button for stadtgrundkarte products
bug.body: for both stadtkarteproducts (farbig, grau) the enabled status of the ausgabeformat button needs to be inverted. This could already been fixed via an replacement in the res.jar of the wuppertal distribution. this bug is intended to keep the same state in the code

bug.title: NAS query fails if other coordinate system is selected than EPSG89
bug.body: if an coordinate system is selected in the navigator the geometries needs to be transformed to EPSG89 since the 3A server expects the geometry in this coordinate system. The transformation process currently used destroys the SRID information of the corresponding GeometryFactory. Since this GeometryFactory is used to create the Geometry used for the NAS server query, the SRID of the resulting geometry is wrong and thus leads to an inaproppriate query. A mid term solution is to use a new GeometryFactory with correct SRID information.

bug.title: Dialogs for "Digitale Datenabgabe" don't show up with every crs
bug.body: see also cismet/wupp#124

bug.title: NasDialog crashes if order id contains file separator char
bug.body: if the user enters an order id in the nas dialog that contains the file separator char and executes the request, an exception is thrown. This happens since the udnerlaying NasDownload cannot create a file with the order id as its name. Therefore it is neceassary to check, if the order id contains a file separator char and to notify the user to correct the order id. see also cismet/wupp#136

bug.title: Improve map interaction in NasDialog
bug.body: - a multiple selection of geometries in the table shows only the last selected geometry zoomed in in the map - at the moment a selection of a geometry in the table forces the map to zoom to that feature. If the table losts the focus the map zooms back to all features. this shall be avoided because if the user wants to adjust the buffer for the geometry the zoomed in view is helpful - adjusting the geometry buffer adjusts the map to show all features. This shall be avoided (see reason above)

bug.title: erroneous map in mauer katasterblatt report
bug.body: under certain circumstances, the map in the mauer katasterblatt report is erroneous (too large scale, wrong map section, no map). from now on, it shall use the headlessmap provider for map generation to avoid this behaviour

bug.title: wrong display of geometries in butler dialogs
bug.body: the generated geometries in both butler dialogs gets generated/displayed wrong. in butler2 dialog the middle point changes every time the size is changed. see also cismet/wupp#124

bug.title: wrong labels for butler dialogs in cismap dropdown menu
bug.body: the labels for the butler 2 dialogs ("ALKIS Datenausgabe (Raster/Vektor)", "kommunale Datenausgabe (Raster/Vektor)") are interchanged. see also cismet/wupp#124

bug.title: using method that is available only since java 1.7
bug.body: this leads to a no such method error if project is started with older java version 1.6

bug.title: changes in field san_massnahmen_gelaender in MauerEditor cannot be saved
bug.body: the reason is a typing error in the binding expression

bug.title: nas context menu action is always available
bug.body: the cismap context menu action for nas is always visible for any user. It should be only visible, if the user has the right to perform nas queries

bug.title: erroneous nas order if intersecting and non intersecting geometries are mixed
bug.body: see also cismet/wupp#119

bug.title: rename accidentally commited method
3A Server cannot handle MultiSurface elements with intersecting parts
bug.body: if a user starts a NAS Download for multiple intersecting geometries, the 3AServer delivers an error file. This can be avoided by calculating and using a union geometry in the case the union geometry is valid simple polygon. see also cismet/wupp#113

bug.title: its not possible to send a nas query under certain circumstances
bug.body: if the user has selected the nas template "komplett" or "ohne eigentuemer", and the volume parameters are greater than 1000 and billing is activated, it is not possible to send the nas request. The reason for this is a spelling mistake in billing file. see also cismet/wupp#113

bug.title: Billing of Vermessungspunkte needs price classes
bug.body: At the moment the prices of Vermessungspunkte are calculated with a normal frequency discount. Example: 10'023 points should be billed, then the price for >10'000 points is looked up and that price is used. if price >10'000 is 0.2 then the total price is 10'023*0.2 = 2004,6 But it should be calculated like this: price <1000 = 0.3 price >10'000 = 0.2 total price = 10'000*0.2 + 23 \* 0.3 = 2006,9

bug.title: nas download ignores downloadmanager job title
bug.body: if the user provides a user title for the download, the NASDownload ignores this name but should saving the nas result in a an folder with the user title. see also cismet/wupp#113

bug.title: wrong fee calculation in nas dialog
bug.body: for the nas templates "ohne eigentuemer" and "komplett" the base price for the first price scale is wrong. see also cismet/wupp#113

bug.title: Missing binding configuration for "nächste Prüfung" field in MauerEditor
bug.body: in fact of the missing binding configuration the field doesnt get filled and saved. see also cismet/wupp#97

bug.title: Dependency for 3aweb not needed
bug.body: because of a transitive dependency from cids-custom-wuppertal-server

bug.title: POI feature renderer multiple highlight geomtries
bug.body: the changes of must be reverted since they were just introduced for the intermediary solution. see also cismet/cismap-commons#35

bug.title: Baulasten-Editor: Wunsch nach bequemerer Datumseingabe
bug.body: http://bugs.cismet.de/view.php?id=1711

bug.title: MauerEditor is not able to load images with blanks in file name
setting correct scale for map image in mauer katasterblatt
bug.body: til now there is a static label for scale. this label should be set dynamically to the corresponding scale of the map

bug.title: missing field lagebezeichnung in mauer renderer
no map in mauer katasterblatt
laufende nr for mauer images must be updated when an image gets removed
bug.body: if an image for an mauer gets removed, the laufende nummer attribute for all remaining images has to be updated since this attribute determines which images gets printed in the mauer_katasterblatt report

bug.title: no line wrap for sanierungsmassnhamen_ansicht scrollpane in Mauer Editor
spelling mistake in MauerEditor
geo search button for MauernWindowSearch is missing
missing field 'mayertyp' in mauer editor
unbounded date field in MauerEditor
MauerWindowSearch doesnt accept comma seperated numbers
MauerEditor doesnt accept comma seperated numbers
Problems when a Mauer Editor and Renderer is open a the same time
bug.body: Don't initialize the GeometryCombo in Renderer !!!!

bug.title: NPE when attempting to create new Mauer
CustomSearch should be safe to contruct ...
bug.body: ...even when the user has no right on certain tables. Because that is a possible source for navigator startup problems.

bug.title: Alkis SOAP Calls are not working in external environments
bug.body: the soap services do not use the web access manager . therefore the usual tunnel mechanism for the external environment does not work. a special server action is needed.

bug.title: Measurement sketches: Spelling corrections
bug.body: Some labels have to be corrected.

bug.title: Measurement sketches: Plausibility check with leading zeros
bug.body: The open field of a measurement sketch is always formatted with leading zeros and has three characters. The new plausibility check introduced with #6 isn't aware of this.

bug.title: Hint for missing images in measurement sketch report
bug.body: A static hint in the measurement sketch report shall explain the user that highlighted measurement sketches don't have images attached. This was already realized. But since some performance optimizations, it doesn't work anymore.

bug.title: Rotate images in measurement sketch report
bug.body: The images in the measurement sketch report are to be rotated for an ideal usage of the available space. This already was realized. But since image loading is done in the report itself, rotating the image was removed from VermessungReportScriptlet.

bug.title: New measurement sketch can't be saved
bug.body: Since the integration of handling images with reduced size, new measurement sketches can't be saved.
